ygData.subject: Re: Probably nothing, but worth checking I think
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I spent a bunch of time in there trying to get them to talk... got nothing out of them... no response, i gave them money, even gave one of them an
ygData.messageBody:
>
>These will probably be nothing, but, if you got a few minutes, might be
>worth looking into.
>
>1) Most likely someone's checked into this already, but what about the
>gnomes in the mino caves? Gimbalstan DID go on an expedition into those
>caves, after all...
Well, I spent a bunch of time in there trying to get them to talk... got
nothing out of them... no response, i gave them money, even gave one of
them an axe so he could kill off the minos quicker. I asked about
Gimblestan, I asked about tinkering, Eldritch Collective, fishing pole, you
name it... My primary reason was to find Bidl Frugrin to complete the
telescope lens quest (this was prior to them fixing the telescope lens
quest), but I did ask tinkering questions since I hoped solving the
telescope lens quest would lead to a further quest related to tinkering.

Madix/Atinky
